mapper.select: select count(*) from reserv_list where reserv_no > 0 and reserv_status = #{search_status} and reserv_date > to_date(#{search_date_start}) and reserv_date < to_date(#{search_date_end}) and reserv_sess like '%' || #{search_sess} || '%' and reserv_ficnic_name like '%' || #{search_ficnic} || '%' and reserv_name like '%' || #{search_name} || '%'
select * from reserv_list where reserv_no = #{reserv_no} and reserv_sess = #{reserv_sess}
